<section id="summary_section" class="sg-container profile-summary profile-summary__section profile-section">
    
        
    

    <h2 class="profile-summary__tagline">Digital Ninjas</h2>
	
	
    <div class="profile-summary__text cropped-summary-text" id="profile-summary-text">
	    <p>We’re all about helping brands and businesses get noticed online. We specialise in web development. When it comes to enhancing beautiful, responsive web design with advanced technology, you could say we’re experts. Whatever your goals, we’re the digital agency that delivers.</p>
<p class="hidden">We have a team that’s focused around quality, not quantity, with experts in project management, design, development and animation that are used to working together as a cohesive team in an environment where the only benchmark that matters is customer success.</p><button type="button" id="read_more" class="read-more" aria-label="Summary Read More">Read more...</button>
    </div>
    <meta itemprop="description" content="We’re all about helping brands and businesses get noticed online. We specialise in web development. When it comes to enhancing beautiful, responsive web design with advanced technology, you could say we’re experts. Whatever your goals, we’re the digital agency that delivers.
We have a team that’s focused around quality, not quantity, with experts in project management, design, development and animation that are used to working together as a cohesive team in an environment where the only benchmark that matters is customer success.Read more...">

</li>

	<a 
		href="https://clutch.co/agencies/email"

		Email Marketing
	</a>
	
	<span>5%</span>
</li>


    </ul>
  </div>
</section>

			<p>Supreme Software launched and delivered a fast, flexible, scalable, and secure website with excellent Google Page insights. They responsively collaborated on CRM, email, Skype, and WhatsApp, ensuring to provide accurate solutions for any concerns. Their keen involvement was pivotal to success.</p>
		</p>

		<button
			class="profile-review__button profile-review__button--main review-card-show-more mobile_hide"
			type="button"

		</button>
	
	<div class="profile-review__extra mobile_hide desktop-review-to-hide hidden">
		<section class="profile-review__extra-content mobile-review-to-hide hidden">
			
				<button
					class="profile-review__extra-cross review-card-show-more"
					aria-label="Show more Review data - Cross"
					data-target="#review-149953">
				</button>
			
			<p class="profile-review__extra-type">
				
				The client submitted this review online.
				

				
			</p>
			
			<div id="background-149953"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Background">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">BACKGROUND</h5>
				<p><strong>Please describe your company and your position there.</strong></p>

<p>TeraPlast Group is the largest polymer processor in Eastern Europe. I'm working here as a Solution Specialist. My current position is related to the online field - websites, online marketing, and online advertising.</p>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="challenge-149953"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Challenge">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">OPPORTUNITY / CHALLENGE</h5>
				<p><strong>For what projects/services did your company hire Supreme, and what were your goals?</strong></p>

<p>We were looking for a new version of our website, a fresh one. the biggest challenges were: to recreate every website page in the new page builder (Oxygen Builder), for connect the website to our CRM, for integrate the stock chart almost in real time through an API, and to create a very fluent user journey through our product pages - we have a very complex product structure.</p>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="solution-149953"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Solution">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">SOLUTION</h5>
				<p><strong>How did you select this vendor and what were the deciding factors?</strong></p>

<p>They have worked on another old project from our group. We received the project and started the discussions with Supreme. My team was new to that project. From the very beginning, we saw the compatibilly and the flexibility of Supreme's team. Everything was simple, clear, and cost-efficient. More than that, we always appreciate their pro-activity for discover the best solution for our needs.</p>

<p><strong>Describe the scope of work in detail, including the project steps, key deliverables, and technologies used.</strong></p>

<p>We had a kick-off meeting for this project to set up our needs and goals. After this step, everything was translated to our working tool - their CRM. We have split the requests between design and development tasks. We have worked closely with Supreme's dedicated project manager to accomplish the design stage with all the mockups agreed upon by our team.</p>

<p>After this step is completed, we have moved to our staging website to move forward with development features. If a project phase was completed we have moved to the next one. When the project has reached the final stage, we have made with them a final QA to make sure that everything is in accord with our initial requests. The final step was the website deployment.</p>

<p>Technologies:</p>

<ul><li>WordPress</li>
	<li>PHP</li>
	<li>API</li>
</ul><p><strong>How many people from the vendor's team worked with you, and what were their positions?</strong></p>

<p>We have worked with 3 people from the Supreme' team.</p>

<ul><li>project manager - our primary contact</li>
	<li>web developer - the guy who was in charge of backend development and all website functionalities</li>
	<li>web designer - the man in charge of website design</li>
</ul>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="results-149953"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Results">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">RESULTS &amp; FEEDBACK</h5>
				<p><strong>Can you share any measurable outcomes of the project or general feedback about the deliverables?</strong></p>

<p>Every proposed objective was fulfilled by the new website version launching. Today, we have a more fast and more secure website, a flexible and scalable platform for our clients with a very nice google page insight score. Also, the website's new technology (Oxygen Builder) is impressive</p>

<p><strong>Describe their project management style, including communication tools and timeliness.</strong></p>

<p>One of the most valuable things about Supreme's team is the response time. So, if I encountered an issue I was able to discuss with their project manager. They were always connected with us to find right solution.</p>

<p>Tools we used:</p>

<ul><li>CRM and email - for usual tasks</li>
	<li>skype - for general discussions</li>
	<li>whatsapp - for urgent issues</li>
</ul><p><strong>What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?</strong></p>

<p>The most valuable thing that we have received from the Supreme' team is that we found a partner, not a simple vendor. Almost every team can give a solution, but not too many are capable to stay involved in the project from the very beginning to the end of a stage.</p>

<p><strong>Are there any areas for improvement or something they could have done differently?</strong></p>

<p>I recommend they to change their CRM with another solution, but this can be just a personal judgment.</p>
			</div>
			
			
			
			<div id="rating-149953"
			     class="profile-review__extra-section rating"
			     data-link-text="Ratings">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">RATINGS</h5>
				<div class="sg-rating profile-review__extra-rating" itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Rating">
                    <span class="sg-rating__number" itemprop="ratingValue">
                        
						5.0
                    </span>
					<div class="sg-rating__stars"
					     style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"
					></div>
				</div>
				
				<ul class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics mobile-review-to-hide hidden">
					<li class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-item">
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-title">Quality</p>
						<span class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-score">
                                5.0
                            </span>
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-description">Service & Deliverables</p>
						
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-quote">"High qualified team"</p>
						
					</li>
					<li class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-item">
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-title">Schedule</p>
						<span class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-score">
                                5.0
                            </span>
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-description">On time / deadlines</p>
						
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-quote">"High pro-active team"</p>
						
					</li>
					<li class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-item">
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-title">Cost</p>
						<span class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-score">
                                5.0
                            </span>
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-description">Value / within estimates</p>
						
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-quote">"High cost-efficient working team"</p>
						
					</li>
					<li class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-item">
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-title">Willing to Refer</p>
						<span class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-score">
                                5.0
                            </span>
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-description">NPS</p>
						
						<p class="profile-review__extra-detailed-metrics-quote">"They are a true partner for our projects</p>
						
					</li>
				</ul>
			</div>
		</section>

				class="profile-review__button profile-review__extra-button review-card-show-more"

				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">BACKGROUND</h5>
				<p><strong>Please describe your company and your position there.</strong></p>

<p>Online store which sells travel bags. My position - manager</p>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="challenge-149677"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"

				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">OPPORTUNITY / CHALLENGE</h5>
				<p><strong>For what projects/services did your company hire Supreme?</strong></p>

<p>Website maintenance</p>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="solution-149677"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Solution">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">SOLUTION</h5>
				<p><strong>How did you select this vendor and what were the deciding factors?</strong></p>

<p>It was recommended to me and I continued the collaboration due to the promptness.</p>

<p><strong>Describe the project in detail and walk through their service package.</strong></p>

<p>Website maintenance, updates + FIX acces update, links between Social Media and website, front page design.</p>

<p><strong>How many resources from the vendor's team worked with you, and what were their positions?</strong></p>

<p>I worked with two IT specialists.</p>
			</div>
			
			
			<div id="results-149677"
			     class="profile-review__text with-border profile-review__extra-section"
			     data-link-text="Results">
				<h5 class="profile-review__extra-title">RESULTS &amp; FEEDBACK</h5>
				<p><strong>Can you share any outcomes from the project that demonstrate progress or success?</strong></p>

<p>They did the main updates very fast and the website is running very good.</p>

<p><strong>How effective was the workflow between your team and theirs?</strong></p>

<p>If we have website issues they go back to us very fast and they solve the problems in the same hour.</p>

<p><strong>What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?</strong></p>

<p>Their timeliness is second to none.</p>

<p><strong>Are there any areas for improvement or something they could have done differently?</strong></p>

<p>No</p>
			</div>

        <section id="contact" class="profile-section profile-scroll-spy-section">
  <div class="sg-accordion sg-accordion--open" id="contact-sg-accordion">
    <button type="button" aria-label="Contact section accordion" class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus">
      <span class="sg-container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">Contact</span>
    </button>
    <div class="sg-container sg-accordion__contents profile-contact-section">
      <div class="profile-contact-section__cta">
        <div class="profile-contact-section__cta-logo sg-provider-logotype">
          <img
            src="https://img.shgstatic.com/clutch-static-prod/image/scale/50x50/s3fs-public/logos/e3f886644256bc23bd8764e1e92e56bd.jpg"
            alt='Supreme Logo'
            title="Provider Logotype"
            width="50"

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a ations%20strengthen%20their%20defenses.%20Their%20core%20services%20include%20managed%20detection%20and%20response%20(MDR),%20cloud%20security,%20compliance%20support,%20and%20managed%20SIEM/EDR,%20tailored%20to%20reduce%20security%20incidents%20and%20improve%20threat%20visibility.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/techmd%22%20target=%22%22%3ETechMD%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Endicott,%20NY%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$150%20-%20$199%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2043%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20TechMD%20is%20a%20cybersecurity-focused%20IT%20solutions%20firm%20dedicated%20to%20delivering%20secure%20and%20scalable%20technology%20to%20small%20and%20medium-sized%20businesses.%20Their%20services%20include%20robust%20cloud%20solutions,%20cybersecurity%20measures,%20and%20strategic%20IT%20consulting,%20all%20designed%20to%20enhance%20productivity%20while%20safeguarding%20critical%20data.%20By%20integrating%20enterprise-grade%20security%20into%20their%20cloud%20and%20infrastructure%20management%20offerings,%20TechMD%20helps%20organizations%20protect%20against%20threats.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/vumetric%22%20target=%22%22%3EVumetric%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$150%20-%20$199%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2047%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%204.9%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Vumetric%20is%20a%20specialized%20cybersecurity%20firm%20offering%20penetration%20testing%20and%20IT%20security%20assessment%20services.%20Serving%20Fortune%201000%20companies,%20SMBs,%20and%20government%20agencies%20across%20five%20continents ess%20coverage%20and%20brand%20visibility.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%3Cli%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/prlab%22%3E%3Cb%3EPRLab%3C/b%3E%3C/a%3E%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%20%3C/strong%3EAmsterdam,%20Netherlands%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%20%3C/strong%3E$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3E%E2%84%96%20of%20Reviews:%20%3C/strong%3E15%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%20%3C/strong%3E4.9/5%0A%3Cbr%3EPRLab%20offers%20comprehensive%20Public%20Relations%20services,%20including%20media%20relations,%20corporate%20communications,%20content%20creation,%20and%20crisis%20management.%20Across%20their%20reviews,%20clients%20consistently%20praise%20their%20professionalism,%20responsiveness,%20and%20strategic%20approach.%20PRLab's%20ability%20to%20understand%20client%20needs%20and%20deliver%20targeted,%20high-quality%20content%20and%20media%20placements%20is%20frequently%20highlighted,%20making%20them%20a%20reliable%20and%20effective%20partner%20in%20the%20field%20of%20communications%20and%20public%20affairs.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%3Cli%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/webimax%22%3E%3Cb%3EWebiMax%3C/b%3E%3C/a%3E%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%20%3C/strong%3EOcean%20City,%20NJ%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%20%3C/strong%3E$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3E%E2%84%96%20of%20Reviews:%20%3C/strong%3E24%0A%3Cbr%3E%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%20%3C/strong%3E5/5%0A%3Cbr%3EWebiMax%20provides%20a%20range%20of%20Public%20Relations%20services,%20including%20high-quality%20press%20releases,%20video%20interviews,%20and%20content%20development%20to%20enhance%20brand%20visibility.%20Reviews%20on%20Clutch.co%20highlight%20their%20effective%20project%20management,%20timely%20delivery,%20and%20creative%20approach%20to%20communications,%20leading%20to%20increased%20media%20coverage%20and%20mentions%20in%20relevant%20publications.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%3Cli%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/red-banyan%22%3E%3Cb%3ERed%20Banya
